_comments._overview: Admin configuration - controls admin users and their permissions
_comments.admins.pubkeys: Array of Nostr public keys (npub or hex format) with full admin privileges. These users have complete control over the platform.
_comments.admins.permissions: Permission flags for admin users. All permissions are typically true for admins.
_comments.moderators: Moderator users configuration with limited admin privileges
_comments.moderators.pubkeys: Array of Nostr public keys for moderators. These users have content moderation capabilities.
_comments.moderators.permissions: Permission flags for moderators. Typically limited to content creation and moderation.
_comments.permissions.editAnyCourse: Allow editing any course (not just own courses)
_comments.permissions.editOwnCourse: Allow editing only courses created by the user
_comments.permissions.editOwnResource: Allow editing only resources created by the user
_comments.permissions.manageUsers: Allow managing user accounts and roles
_comments.permissions.viewAnalytics: Allow viewing platform analytics and statistics
_comments.permissions.manageNostrEvents: Allow managing Nostr event publishing and relay configuration
_comments.features.requireAdminApproval: Require admin approval for new content before it's published
_comments.features.enableAdminDashboard: Enable the admin dashboard UI at /admin
_comments.features.showAdminBadge: Show admin/moderator badges next to usernames in the UI
